titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Rockefeller Family papers, Home Movies FA1303

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2018-06-08 00:01:09 -0400.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Family papers, Home Movies

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. When requesting to view audiovisual material, please refer to the Title and the AV Number (example: AV 1916). Researchers are asked to check the "Restrictions" note for each Title. If a Title does not currently have an access copy, please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains films created by Rockefeller family members.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. Family Home Movies, 1924-1929
John D. Rockefeller Sr. Home Movie - 001

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL. JDR Sr. hosting at The Casements: Guests exit house; JDR Sr. exits house; addresses camera; greets guests on lawn. Greetings are repeated three times.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. Home Movie - 002

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL. John D Rockefeller golfing: Group golfs wide; Senior putts; hands caddies dimes; pan course; JDR Sr. shakes hands; group gets in cars, drive off.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: 18 frames per second. Primary source: AV 1355.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. Home Movie - 003

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL. John D. Rockefeller Sr. hosting at The Casements: Three different occasions - JDR Sr. greets guests by tree; JDR Sr. and guests exit and get in car. (Action repeated twice.)

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. Home Movie - 004

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. John D. Rockefeller Sr.'s 85th birthday: JDR Sr. and guests putt golf balls on lawn; sit on terrace; walk through Kykuit gardens; man sets up radio.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Family Home Movies

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller home movies between 1928-1934. Types of records include: films.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: When requesting to view audiovisual material, please refer to the Title and the AV Number (example: AV 1916). Researchers are asked to check the "Restrictions" note for each Title. If a Title does not currently have an access copy, please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie - 001

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Babs with newborn Mitzi / In crib; giving bottle; on bed.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie - 002

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. JDR Sr., JDR Jr., AAR, WR, Babs, DM, Mitzi / Family poses for Koshiba portraits with baby Mitzi.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie - 003

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. Babs, DM, Mitzi - at One Beekman Place / Mitzi in playpen; crib; highchair; fed by Babs.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: 18 frames per second. Primary source: AV 65.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie - 004

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Princeton, NJ. Babs, DM - at the home of David Hunter McAlpin III / with McAlpin family on terrace; in car; playing with kids on lawn.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie - 005

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Oyster Bay, NY. Babs, DM - at the home of Mrs. Ellen Hunt Milton / with Wallace and Ellen Milton Harrison by house; swimming in lake.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie - 006

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Westbury, NY. Babs at the home of George and Margaret Strong de Cuevas. Babs, Margaret, and daughter Bessie in sun room.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie – 007

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Tarrytown, NY. JDR Sr. and Mitzi on golf course. Senior golfs with group; Mitzi plays with club; car arrives for Senior.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie – 008

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. DR and Mitzi at Kykuit: play at sheep barn; Japanese lake; Mitzi rides pony Rastus with Joe Plick.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie – 009

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Mitzi at Kykuit: swims in fountain; plays on lawn; people (staff?) exit frame house.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie – 010

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. JDR Sr. and Mitzi at Kykuit: exchange flower; sit on bench; golf; view from Kykuit; Mitzi in pram; plays with doll; on lawn.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie – 011

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. One Beekman Place: Mitzi on terrace, plays with doll; carriage; pail and shovel; statue; views of East River; building dock; Manhattan's East 40's.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie – 012

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Seal Harbor, ME. Mitzi picking berries; Mitzi and Babs with baby Marilyn (7 weeks old).

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie – 013

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Seal Harbor, ME. DM, Mitzi on dock; sailing; Babs, DM, Mitzi picnic on rocks.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie – 014

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Babs, Mitzi, baby Marilyn (3 months old) on Abeyton Lodge porch; JDR Jr., AAR, Mitzi depart Abeyton in pony cart.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie – 015

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Jr., AAR, Babs, DM, JDR3, NAR, MCR, LSR, WR, DR, Mitzi at Playhouse. Mitzi and AAR arrive; family drives cars around circle: parking lot.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie – 016

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Jr., Babs, DM, JDR3, NAR, MCR, LSR, WR, DR, Mitzi at Playhouse and Abeyton Lodge; croquet; on porch; on bikes; by wishing well.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie – 017

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Seal Harbor, ME. DM, Mitzi sailing; DM, Mitzi and Marilyn with AAR on boat; AAR, DR, DM, Mitzi and Marilyn picnic on Sutton Island.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie – 018

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Seal Harbor, ME. Babs, DM, Mitzi fishing from sail boat; Mitzi amd Marilyn at Seal Harbor Club kiddie pool; Babs on Wabenaki home balcony.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie – 019

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL. NAR, LSR, DR, DM dig in sand; DR, Babs, DM, NAR in ocean; NAR, MCR, Babs, DM, Lifeguard bury DR in the sand.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie – 020

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. One Beekman Place: Mitzi and Marilyn on terrace; tumble; play with watering can and statue; East River views; at building's playground.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie – 021

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. One Beekman Place: Mitzi does acrobatics in apartment; Mitzi and Marilyn sit on terrace bench.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie – 022

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Milton Home: DM, Mitzi and Marilyn on go-kart; girls feed chickens; feed dogs and cats; play on lawn.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie – 023

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. One Beekman Place: in apartment Mitzi tap dances; does acrobatics; East River and Welfare Island views; Mitzi and Marilyn sit by terrace statue.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie – 024

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Milton Home: Mitzi and Marilyn feed chickens; Mitzi at bee hive; girls play on haystack; DM, Mitzi on lake raft; Marilyn on sand.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie – 025

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Milton Home: Mitzi and Marilyn wade in pool; girls play with dog; Babs, DM, Mitzi and Marilyn fish off footbridge; play with cats.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie – 026: "Looney Tunes by Babs"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Various locations. "Looney Tunes by Babs" - Milton Family film compilation. Edited by Abby Rockefeller Mauze and Mitzi O'Neill, c. 1960.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Home Movie – 026: Head and Tail cards for "Looney Tunes by Babs"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Head and Tail cards for the "Looney Tunes by Babs" compilation. B and O Film Effects.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movies

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: John D. Rockefeller Jr. home movies between 1917-1946. Types of records include: films.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: When requesting to view audiovisual material, please refer to the Title and the AV Number (example: AV 1916). Researchers are asked to check the "Restrictions" note for each Title. If a Title does not currently have an access copy, please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movie - 001

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. Rockefeller Children at 10 West 54th Street – filmed by Koshiba: LSR, WR with book; NAR, DR, WR, LSR, Babs, JDR3 with toys and book; LSR, WR ride toy hand cars in solarium, LSR fixes wheel.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movie - 002

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. David Rockefeller at 10 West 54th Street – filmed by Koshiba. DR with flowers, hobby horse, blocks and book.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movie - 003

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. School pageant at The Lincoln School - 646 Park Avenue; Children shop, buy ticket, form train, farm, milk cow and garden.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movie - 004

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. Science demonstration at The Lincoln School - 646 Park Avenue: Man blows glass, works gas-discharge lamp apparatus.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movie - 005

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part I: JDR3, NAR, LSR, WR and DR enter with bunnies, joined by AAR; single medium shots of JDR3, NAR, LSR and WR.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movie - 006

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part II: JDR3, NAR, LSR, WR and DR leave Abeyton Lodge riding bicycles; DR rides tricycle, plays with dog, DR close-ups on trike near Abeyton.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movie - 007

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part III: AAR, Babs, and five brothers say goodbyes to Junior in front of Abeyton Lodge; Jr. drives off in a carriage; AAR, DR, watch Babs drive off from Abeyton in a car – with unedited takes

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movie - 008

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part IV: NAR, LSR, WR and DR ride horses on the grounds with Joe Plick.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movie - 009

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part V: Senior and JDR3 golf on the grounds; pan of Kykuit from below.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movie - 010

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Atlantic crossings, various France locations. Family Trip to France: on ship – NAR, DR, JDR3 play games; French villages; DR, WR row boat; with goats; DR catches bugs at Fontainebleau; Versailles; return voyage – NAR with girl, NAR, LSR play games; views of NYC harbor and skyline.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movie - 011

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Reims, France. Reims Cathedral undergoing restoration; Views from tower and roof of work in progress on Cathedral.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movie - 012

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Western US. Three unidentified young men hiking in Yosemite; shots of waterfall; unidentified younger children play in stream.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movie - 013

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Maine. Unidentified teenage group pillow fight on lawn, ride tree swing, wrestle, toss ball; group swims in lake, uses canoe and motorboat.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movie - 014

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL. Christmas morning at The Casements: Junior, Babs, DM, AAR, NAR, WR, JDR3 open Christmas gifts.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movie - 015

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Family at Playhouse on Easter Sunday (filmed with three different cameras): Sr., Jr., AAR, Babs JDR3, NAR, LSR, WR, DR and others at Union Church; arrive at Playhouse, play croquet, sit on terrace, leave Playhouse; arrive at Abeyton Lodge.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movie - 016

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Teenage WR and group of friends drive around Kykuit and Abeyton Lodge in Model T; clown around at wishing well.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movie - 017

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. NAR, MTR, WR and group of friends drive Model T; arrive at Abeyton Lodge; drive to Playhouse; swim in indoor pool.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movie - 018

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. NAR, MTR say goodbye to AAR, WR on porch of Abeyton Lodge; drive off in Mercury convertible to Playhouse.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movie - 019

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Princeton, NJ. Princeton, Yale, and Cornell track meet at Palmer Stadium: Shots of various track and field events, some in slow motion. (Filmed by Winthrop, who attended Yale 1931-34.)

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movie - 020

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Williamsburg, VA. Scenes of Mr. and Mrs. Rockefeller, Jr. at Bassett Hall: Junior and AAR have tea in garden; AAR knits scarf for war effort; Junior reviews blueprints with Kenneth Chorley and William Perry.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movie - 021

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Seal Harbor, ME. The Eyrie Garden: AAR, Junior and WR (in uniform) walkthrough garden, sit on benches.
